content.p: Department of Mechanical, Materials and Manufacturing Engineering Follow us on LinkedIn This is the place flying towards a better future. We develop exceptional aerospace engineers who help make a greener planet spin a little smoother. Here you get the space, support, skills and connections to revel in the real world. Immerse yourself in cutting-edge tools and technologies for aircraft design and manufacturing - from aerodynamics and avionics to flight mechanics and human factors. From career-advancing courses to our world-leading research, our aerospace engineers are highly sought after in both the aerospace sector and other industries. Get ready to shape the real world. Explore Aerospace Engineering facilities Learn about pioneering research for a sustainable future Where are Aerospace Engineering graduates now? View contact details, expertise and publications "Aerospace engineering isn’t just sitting in a classroom or listening to lectures, it's hands on learning. Using facilities like the wind tunnels, building gliders, and working on project weeks. University of Nottingham has a huge engineering department and big open modern spaces, so the learning environment was very attractive." — Emma Tardrew, Aerospace Engineering MEng graduate for Aerospace Engineering in The Guardian University Guide 2024 and The Complete University Guide 2024
